file.path: D:\TorrentDir\Epub Collection#6(32Skulls)\Donna Leon - [Guido Brunetti 08] - Fatal Remedies (retail) (epub).epub
file.name: Donna Leon - [Guido Brunetti 08] - Fatal Remedies (retail) (epub).epub

tika.dc.description: For Commissario Brunetti, it began with an early morning phone call. In the chill of the Venetian dawn, a sudden act of vandalism shatters the quiet of the deserted city. But soon Brunetti is shocked to find that the culprit waiting to be apprehended at the scene is someone from his own family. Meanwhile, Brunetti is under pressure from his superiors to solve a daring robbery with a link to a suspicious accidental death. Does it all lead back to the Mafia? And how are his family’s actions connected to these crimes?
